IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_synapsedatalakeg2_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_synapsedatalakeg2_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://synapsedatalakeg2.dfs.core.windows.net/gold', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE DimActor (
	[ActorName] varchar(8000),
	[ActorID] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'DimActors.parquet/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_synapsedatalakeg2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM DimActor
GO
